verbs.description: [ARG1: synagogue] [V: shooting] ‘ will not break us it will not ruin us ’ rabbi says at vigil the day after a gunman who spewed anti - semitic rhetoric allegedly killed 11 congregants in a pittsburgh synagogue thousands mourned the dead said their names out loud and proclaimed that hate was n't welcome in their city rabbi
